inclusion.criterion: Subject has a diagnosis of epilepsy with simple partial seizure and/or complex partial seizures
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects who have a baseline seizure rate of more than 2 per month in the eight week period preceding the start of AMPA / NMDA receptor antagonist
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: No seizure free period longer than 21 days during the eight week period before AMPA receptor antagonist was started
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patients who already had neuropsychiatric inventory completed twice during the treatment period spanning at least 16 weeks.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Subjects with idiopathic generalised epilepsy (for example, juvenile myoclonic epilepsy and absence epilepsy)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who only suffer from isolated auras
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Baseline creatinine clearance of less than 50ml/min
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Severe hepatic impairment with ALT three times the upper limits of normal
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Significant psychiatric conditions before the start of AMPA / NMDA receptor antagonist
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: History of severe haematological conditions or serious blood dyscrasias
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of epilepsy, CHF, and depression. He has had seizures in the past but was recently tapered off Dilantin and has been seizure-free for some time.
